column4: I can't play an mp3 all of a sudden.  Nor can I start Ardour, getting jack starting issues.  Weird.  Anyone else experiencing the mp3 bit in hardy?
Did you check Launchpad for bugs?
nope.  Thought I'd poke here first.
It's actually better to check launchpad first, since there may be workaround info, links to Ubuntu forum threads, etc.
